net.sf.nachocalendar.customizer
Class XMLCustomizer

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      net.sf.nachocalendar.customizer.XMLCustomizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, Customizer, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class XMLCustomizer
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
implements Customizer

This class reads an xml file to get properties values.

Author:
Ignacio Merani
